data.eml:eml: Studies of Peruvian Ptiliidae (Coleoptera) 3: the genus Discheramocephalus Johnson including six new species, and validation of the unavailable generic name Phytotelmatrichis Darby and Chaboo

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Darby, Michael (2016): Studies of Peruvian Ptiliidae (Coleoptera) 3: the genus Discheramocephalus Johnson including six new species, and validation of the unavailable generic name Phytotelmatrichis Darby and Chaboo. Zootaxa 4097 (3): 416-425, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4097.3.9
